projects.title: WeatherApp
projects.description: A simple weather application that fetches weather data using APIs and displays it in a user-friendly manner.

projects.title: Foodie
projects.description: A food recipe app where users can search, save, and share their favorite recipes.

projects.title: ChatMaster
projects.description: A real-time chat application with user authentication, real-time messaging, and group chats.

projects.title: TaskMaster
projects.description: A task management app to help users organize tasks and set deadlines with notifications.

projects.title: Fitness Tracker
projects.description: An app to track fitness activities, set goals, and monitor progress.

projects.title: Expense Tracker
projects.description: A finance management app that helps users track their expenses and budget.

projects.title: Meditation Guide
projects.description: An app to guide users through meditation and mindfulness exercises.

projects.title: News Reader
projects.description: An app to read and stay updated on the latest news from various sources.

projects.title: QR Scanner
projects.description: A QR code scanner that allows users to quickly scan and save information from codes.

projects.title: Expense Splitter
projects.description: An app to split bills and expenses between multiple users in a group.
